use_cases.case: The genome of Chlamydia pecorum W73 (CP004034) was used to identify identify regions of recombination among C. pecorum isolate genomes.
The genome of Chlamydia pecorum W73 (CP004034) was included in several phylogenetic analyses involving various Chlamydia pecorum strains.
The genome of Chlamydia pecorum W73 (CP004034) was used as a reference for read-mapping against the newly resequenced genomes of strains DBDeUG_2018 and MC/MarsBar_2018.
